actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-25.

official_title: A resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-25) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $621,600, from March 1, 1979, through February 29, 1980, by the Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs for inquiries and investigations. Directs the committee to report its findings and recommendations to the Senate not later than February 29, 1980.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Indian Affairs for inquiries and investigations.
